name: 隠密くのいちの冒険
description:
Game Over when an enemy finds you.
Get to the top floor through the traps and enemies sight!
Get the fastest clear time!

--------------------------------------------------------
敵に見つかれば即、ゲームオーバー。
敵の視線と罠をくぐり抜けて城の最上階までたどり着け！
最速タイムをたたき出せ！
--------------------------------------------------------
-How to play-

keyboard
right/left:move
z:jump/Double Jump
x:attack
down:Crawl
up:(At particular place) Stick to the ceiling
